group_1.narration: Kamihama has been moving forward@little by little since that day.
Magical Girls hold hands while@the city continues to recover.
There is one person that still@threatens this moment of peace...
And that, is right in front of me.

group_1.textLeft: ...Halloween?

group_1.textRight: Right! Halloween!!
It's nearly here, but every district is saying the event@is cancelled.

group_1.textLeft: Why?

group_1.textRight: You know, the damage in Chuo Ward.
For sooome reason all of Kamihama has this kind of@mood.

group_1.textLeft: I see...@It can't be helped then, can it?

group_1.textRight: I think there's still lots of people that want to do it@thooough.

group_1.textLeft: But, nobody is doing anything, right?

group_1.textRight: You're totally riiight.

group_1.textLeft: If that's how it is, I think there isn't anything that@can be done...

group_1.textRight: Hmm, but to just do nothiiingâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Ayaka must really like Halloween.

group_1.textRight: Halloween's "also" something I like!
Doesn't an event like that just make everyone smile?!
That's why, right now Kamihama really needs it!
Ahh, geez! It would be a waste, Kamihama!
If there's even a chance, I'll bring smiles to the whole@city!

group_1.textLeft: ...Then, why not try, Ayaka?

group_1.textRight: Heh? What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Um... I was just thinking.
If your goal is to make everyone smile...
Ayaka should organize things to do just that.

group_1.narration: Thinking back on it now,@I think that was a very reasonable statement.
But, my statement@made Ayaka get serious.

group_1.textLeft: But, that's really impossible.
A high school student alone can't host an event...

group_1.textRight: I will... for an event...
That's it...!
[chara:301901:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]That's it Shizuku!
All I have to do is make everyone smile!

group_1.textLeft: Ayaka will... make everyone smile?

group_1.textRight: Right! A live comedy show! I will, bring laughter to@Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: ...Seriously?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, let's do our best together!
No, starting today, shall I call you partner?

group_1.textLeft: Wha... but I'm not willing to do this...
Live comedy... you said?

group_1.textRight: Exactly! How about it? Will you join as my partner?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I want to try.
But... where do you go live?
We would have to gather an audience...

group_1.textRight: That's what I tried telling her, but...

group_1.textLeft: Somehow we'll do it!!

group_1.textRight: ...You say that.

group_1.textLeft: The desire to make everyone smile is the most@important thing!

group_1.textRight: That's fine, but, the fact of the matter is...

group_1.textLeft: I understand.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I too, am encouraged by Master's comedy!
This time, I will give back with my comedy!

group_1.textRight: Alriiight!
Then let's get material immediately!

group_1.narration: Because of this, my daily life@has once again become noisy.
